Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Nit... with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard, parallel hands in relief(damaged) holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
